The claim of a new Rs: 1000 currency note design in Sri Lanka in 2020 is false, according to Sri Lanka's Central Bank.
The batch of banknotes was presented to: 2020, as confirmed by a spokesperson for the bank.
The design of the 1: 000 rupee note in the misleading posts is identical to the one that has been in circulation since 2010, as shown on the Central Bank's website.
